description:
Hit the waves with a little extra support on your side. From bellyflop competitions, to paddling out into the breakers, these trunks use Saxx’s Ballpark™ Pouch to keep everything right where it should be. With a formfitting mesh liner, tucked under a relaxed fit shell, the Betawave shorts will have you rethinking how comfy boardshorts can be.

  • Breathable micro-mesh liner and quick-drying poly and spandex blend shell
  • Seamless on the inside front to prevent irritation and reduce chafing
  • Fixed waist with a tie in the front to snug in that perfect fit
  • Ballpark Pouch provides support and stability
  • Parallel side panels offer a barrier between one's package and inner thigh
  • Slim-fit liner hugs the body without being restrictive
  • 19in. outseam and 9in. inseam
name: Saxx Betawave 2 in 1 Boardie 19" Boardshorts - Men's
